channel.title: How do we give ppl a rep!?!

item.title: How do we give ppl a rep!?!
item.dc:creator: @bib bib
item.description:
@bib wrote:

goto charevcters and do charecter rights and add this to client.java

item.source: How do we give ppl a rep!?!

item.title: How do we give ppl a rep!?!
item.dc:creator: @GetOwned GetOwned
item.description:
@GetOwned wrote:

Yea, best way for rep is to make tuts, obviously, also, be of as much help as you can. If you help someone who has a lot of rep, then they might give you a rep. You have to have 15 rep to give others rep, which I’m sure you know that by now.

Read full topic
item.source: How do we give ppl a rep!?!
